name: Dot Piece Puzzle - Dotpicture
description:
How to play "Dot Piece Puzzle"

This is the simple puzzle game what uses dot-art.
The player fits the Dot-Piece that come apart, after the model Dot-Picture as a guide.

How to Play "Dot Piece Puzzle"

This is a puzzle game in which the player fits the scattered dot pieces together, using the model dot picture as a guide.

Contents

You can play 59 puzzles what different dot-picture patterns based on the themes, "Animals" and "Foods" and the others.
At first, you start to play easy puzzle and try difficult a little bit.
During from easy to difficult, you can play more than 290+ ways.

"Kurayami" mode

"Kurayami" mode (exclusive to the Steam version) for experienced players, where you must solve puzzles without any reference image.
And "Kaiten" mode tests your skills by requiring you to rotate the pieces before placing them.
Simple and intuitive gameplay that's perfect for players of all ages and skill levels.
The puzzles are challenging but not too difficult, providing a sense of accomplishment when they are solved.

Languages

"Dot Piece Puzzle" can translate 17 languages; Japanese, English(US), Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, German, French, Italian, Spanish(Español), Arabic, Hindi, Bengali, Tamil, Indonesian, Russian, Portuguese(Brasil), and Polish.
You can choose the language of the puzzle names and the messages from the options, if you want.

Comment from the Creator

We created "Dot Piece Puzzle" because we wanted to play a puzzle game where we could create pixel art.
We love the feeling of the pieces fitting together and the sense of accomplishment when we solve a puzzle.
We hope you enjoy playing "Dot Piece Puzzle" as much as we enjoyed creating it!
